recruitment.name: Elena Rosetti
recruitment.rationale: Commercial faction expands Market control capability. Wealthy widow provides 7 gold resource pool for future power card plays. Aggressive gold-driven player archetype alignment.

actions.rationale: Available THIS TURN (turn 3). Increases gold from 1 to 6, enabling gold-cost power card plays and whitewash mitigation. Resource pressure.

actions.ability_text: 3 Place two influence on any Religious courtier
actions.rationale: Available THIS TURN (turn 3). Places 2 FREE influence on COURT_003 (High Priest Matthias, 5 slots). Religious courtier is uncontested. Secures 2 of 5 slots immediately.

actions.ability_text: 2 Remove one influence from target square
actions.rationale: Available NOW (turn 3, requires turn 2+). Removes 1 influence from P1's BAR_02 (currently 4 P1 influence). Weakens P1 Barracks dominance. Tactical disruption of primary military threat.

free_actions.rationale: Place 2 from influence pool on COURT_003. Combined with Pietro ability (2), = 4/5 slots filled. I control COURT_003 (High Priest Matthias).

Deploy 9 influence into Barracks to contest P1 military dominance. Steele (Military) is active, providing Military faction access. Barracks currently P1-controlled (7 influence). 9 new influence forces contested squares and weakens P1's control percentage.

COURT_003_after.name: High Priest Matthias
COURT_003_after.note: Controlled by P3 with 4 influence (2 from Pietro ability + 2 from pool)

Barracks_after.note: Major contest launched. P1 holds 6 via Kragg removal, P3 now has 9 spread across BAR_03, BAR_04, BAR_05, BAR_06. Barracks is now CONTESTED, preventing P1 from claiming full district control.

tactical_thesis: AGGRESSIVE TAKEOVER CYCLE. Deployed all 3 actions for MAXIMUM DISRUPTION: (1) +5 gold enables future power card plays, (2) locked down COURT_003 with Pietro ability, (3) weakened P1 Barracks via Kragg removal. FREE actions: placed 2 more on COURT_003 = COMPLETE CONTROL, deployed 9 influence into Barracks = CONTEST P1 territory. Result: courtier denial (COURT_003 locked), district pressure (Barracks contested), resource expansion (6 gold). Positioning for PETITION_008 or late-cycle petitions requiring Military courtier control.
escalation_check: No escalation needed. P1 still VP leader (39) but weakening through Barracks pressure. P2 economic (55 VP) but confined to Market. P3 aggressive positioning holds. Continue territorial expansion next turn.
